title: Panic: invalid RLP string size 269 (want 0 or 32) (decode path: [4]<-full)
body:
#### System information

Geth version: Version: 1.10.26-stable
CL client & version: Prysm/v3.1.2/648ab9f2c249f1d06d0aad4328e8df429ceaf66c
OS & Version: Windows 10, 32gb ram


#### Actual behaviour
The node was working find until now. When I run it it works fine for some time, then it crashes with the same error.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

run arguments:`geth.exe --ws --ws.addr 192.168.2.9 --ws.port 8546 --ws.api=eth,debug,net,web3,txpool --authrpc.jwtsecret n:\jwt.hex --datadir n:\ethereum --nat extip:[my ip]`

#### Backtrace

````
panic: node 25cd7b75aa0c01ed48d74bba5fc459b899cead4d7b7b615476190f3fb2b3e727: invalid RLP string size 269 (want 0 or 32) (decode path: [4]<-full)

goroutine 286329 [running]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.mustDecodeNodeUnsafe({0xc144fac100, 0x20, 0x20}, {0xc0606fef00?, 0xc0606fef00?, 0x243?})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/node.go:116 +0xd4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Database).node(0xc00015acc0, {0x25, 0xcd, 0x7b, 0x75, 0xaa, 0xc, 0x1, 0xed, 0x48, ...})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/database.go:382 +0x239
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).resolveHash(0xc0c377ed80, {0xc11b4b216f?, 0x7ff7bca230b6?, 0xc0293cf268?}, {0xc040991770, 0x5, 0x41})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:560 +0xe5
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0x20?, {0x7ff7bdfcdf10?, 0xc12e35bf98?}, {0xc040991770, 0x41, 0x41}, 0x5)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:176 +0xe6
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xc0c377ed80?, {0x7ff7bdfccef0?, 0xc02b4bca00?}, {0xc040991770, 0xc040991770?, 0x4?}, 0x4)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:169 +0x3f4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0x4b5fcbac153cdbf?, {0x7ff7bdfcdf10?, 0xc110fe2258?}, {0xc040991770, 0x41, 0x41}, 0x4)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:180 +0x176
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xc0c377ed80?, {0x7ff7bdfccef0?, 0xc02b780140?}, {0xc040991770, 0xc040991770?, 0x3?}, 0x3)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:169 +0x3f4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xf22ab52246add520?, {0x7ff7bdfcdf10?, 0xc0fab7e798?}, {0xc040991770, 0x41, 0x41}, 0x3)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:180 +0x176
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xc0c377ed80?, {0x7ff7bdfccef0?, 0xc02b780000?}, {0xc040991770, 0xc040991770?, 0x2?}, 0x2)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:169 +0x3f4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0x2a1af08016459ffc?, {0x7ff7bdfcdf10?, 0xc14db04438?}, {0xc040991770, 0x41, 0x41}, 0x2)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:180 +0x176
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xc0c377ed80?, {0x7ff7bdfccef0?, 0xc02b27be00?}, {0xc040991770, 0xc040991770?, 0x1?}, 0x1)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:169 +0x3f4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xdcb05640591b6065?, {0x7ff7bdfcdf10?, 0xc110cde450?}, {0xc040991770, 0x41, 0x41}, 0x1)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:180 +0x176
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).tryGet(0xc0293cfce8?, {0x7ff7bdfccef0?, 0xc0299c4640?}, {0xc040991770, 0xc182149090?, 0x20?}, 0x0)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:169 +0x3f4
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*Trie).TryGet(0xc0c377ed80, {0xc0c377edd0, 0x20, 0x20?})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/trie.go:144 +0xd6
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie.(*StateTrie).TryGet(0xc0c377ed80, {0xc152978ce0?, 0xc152978ce0?, 0x20?})
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/trie/secure_trie.go:92 +0x3d
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/state.(*subfetcher).loop(0xc0a945cf70)
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/state/trie_prefetcher.go:337 +0x810
created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/state.newSubfetcher
        github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/state/trie_prefetcher.go:236 +0x1cb
````

Could you show what you get from doing the following: `geth --datadir n:\ethereum db get 0x25cd7b75aa0c01ed48d74bba5fc459b899cead4d7b7b615476190f3fb2b3e727`

That ought to spit out the `269` byte long malformed rlp from the db, it would be interesting to try and determine what it is.
Ping? Otherwise, we'll just close this, not much we can do on our end on this ticket.

I apologize, I never saw the first reply. I later remembered that I had removed the triecache folder I saw in my system drive just before this issue showed up (I also had a triecache folder in my N drive). I figured it must have been from an older sync because I set the datadir to be in my new drive. Not sure if I need to set it also for the triecache dir but I see nothing in my system drive after the new sync.

I resynced the chain and it's fine so you can close the ticket

Cool

On Thu, Dec 29, 2022, 3:46 PM stefanosstef ***@***.***> wrote:
